column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Belly G
column2: Thank you for providing our 750th review. We appreciate it! I also want to thank you for the fair and accurate description of a typical wait-time here at JINYA. Sunday lunch service can get pretty busy
column3: sometimes filling to capacity in less than 15 mins. This usually happens right after church lets out
column4: and unfortunately it can also make seating a party of 6 or more a little challenging.
